GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
firmware: arm_ffa: Remove incorrect assignment of driver_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit a382e3727f8e59f7a8d6215a443341b0c39a5f27, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit d0c0bce831223b08e5bade2cefc93c3ddb790796. For more details please see the references link.
